Sql.query: insert into me_modulo( modcodi, modnomb, origlectcodi ) values( :modcodi, :modnomb, :origlectcodi )
update me_modulo set modcodi = :modcodi, modnomb = :modnomb, origlectcodi = :origlectcodi where
select modcodi, modnomb, origlectcodi where from me_modulo
select modcodi, modnomb, origlectcodi from me_modulo
select modcodi, modnomb, origlectcodi from me_modulo
